entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whale Cove
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:22 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -42.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whale Cove Airport 9:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -42.1°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -46.2°C
Wind: NW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 59 this evening and minus 64 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
